title: The Ultimate Drawing Course - Beginner to Advanced
headline: Learn the #1 most important building block of all art
objectives_summary: Draw objects out of your head
Draw realistic light and shadow
Understand the fundamentals of art

headline: Learn How to Draw People and Character Designs Professionally, Drawing for Animation, Comics, Cartoons, Games and More!
objectives_summary: How to Draw Characters Well
How to Draw Out of Your Head Fast
How to Draw in 3D

title: The Art & Science of Drawing / BASIC SKILLS
headline: Drawing is not a talent. It's a skill anyone can learn.
objectives_summary: How to draw any shape.
How to observe and analyze any subject.
How to draw any form by breaking it down into basic shapes before adding dark lines.

title: The Secrets to Drawing
headline: A comprehensive video and ebook course designed for people wanting to learn the core concepts of drawing.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course, the student will have a strong understanding of the core concepts of drawing including materials, processes, and devices.

title: How to Draw From Beginner to Master
headline: Drawing and Shading From Fundamentals to Photorealism
objectives_summary: You’ll learn the fundamentals of drawing
You’ll learn about materials Like the different pencil lead weights and what each one is best used for
Shading techniques

objectives_summary: How to Draw Landscape Drawings
How to Draw Environment Drawings
How to Draw Interior Scenes

title: Ultimate Guide to Digital Sketching: Beginner to Advanced
headline: Learn to digitally draw like a pro!
objectives_summary: Digitally sketch from life
Digitally sketch objects and scenes from your imagination
Improve your sketches using digital techniques

title: Discover How to Draw and paint Comics
headline: Learn to draw and paint; from your imagination, guaranteed.
objectives_summary: Learn to Draw and Paint from your imagination
60 hours of video lessons. That's 50 cents per hour.

title: How to Draw and Sketch for Absolute Beginners
headline: Learn the Basics of Sketching and Drawing
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you will be able to draw almost anything
The correct way to use reference
Draw what they see and observe

title: The Art & Science of Drawing / FORM & SPACE
headline: Learn to draw in 3-Dimensions
objectives_summary: How draw the foundational volumes, spheres, cylinders and cubes, in any orientation in space.
How to break any form down into basic volumes and in doing so, understand how to draw them 3-Dimensionally.
How to draw objects properly in perspective.

title: The Art & Science of Drawing / DYNAMIC MARK MAKING
headline: Create compelling drawings using expressive mark making.
objectives_summary: How to use the pencil to create a wide range of expressive and engaging lines marks.
How to infuse your line work with emotion that truly connect with a viewer.
How to draw objects in a way that give the viewer a sense of what it feels like to the touch.

title: The Art & Science of Drawing / SHADING FUNDAMENTALS
headline: Learn how to draw using dramatic light and shadow.
objectives_summary: How to draw basic volumes using dramatic light and shadow.
How light and shadow operate on the fundamental volumes: the sphere, the cube and the cylinder.
How to recognize and draw fundamental light and shadow patterns including the highlight, the core shadow, reflected light and the cast shadow.
